mean_cn: n. 神志不清，极度兴奋
mean_en: a mental state in which you are confused and not able to think or speak clearly usually because of fever or some other illness
word_etyma: deliri =ma(疯+ um表名词 → 精神错乱；发狂，狂热；说谵语状态
sentence: As her delirium got worse, she started screaming and tearing her hair.
sentence_trans: 随着她神志不清的症状恶化，她开始尖叫并且撕扯自己的头发。
